sentences.en: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.cn: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

sentences.en: Almost without exception these women fall victim to exploitation.
sentences.cn: 这些女性几乎无一例外都受到了盘剥。

sentences.en: At Brussels airport he fell victim to pickpockets who pinched his wallet.
sentences.cn: 在布鲁塞尔机场，他被扒手盯上，钱包被偷走了。

sentences.en: He claimed he was the victim of a dirty tricks campaign..
sentences.cn: 他声称他是一场卑鄙的竞选运动的牺牲品。

sentences.en: He was a victim of racial prejudice.
sentences.cn: 他是种族歧视的受害者。

sentences.en: He was innocent and the victim of a frame-up.
sentences.cn: 他是清白的，是受人诬陷的。

sentences.en: I'm not a fashion victim; I stick to what suits me.
sentences.cn: 我不是一味赶时髦的人，我只穿适合自己的服装。

sentences.en: In the early 1960s, Blyton fell victim to Alzheimer's disease.
sentences.cn: 在19世纪60年代早期，布莱顿患上了老年痴呆症。

sentences.en: many streams have fallen victim to the recent drought.
sentences.cn: 许多河流都受到了近期干旱的影响。

sentences.en: Pythons kill by tightening their coils so that their victim cannot breathe.
sentences.cn: 大蟒蛇紧紧盘绕猎物使之无法呼吸，从而杀死猎物。

sentences.en: She is the victim of a big con trick.
sentences.cn: 她是一场大骗局的受害者。

sentences.en: The offender made proper restitution to the victim's kindred.
sentences.cn: 违法者对受害人亲属给予了适当的补偿。

sentences.en: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.cn: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.en: The victim suffered a dreadful injury and lost a lot of blood.
sentences.cn: 受害者受了重伤，大量失血。

sentences.en: The victim was hit by a hail of bullets.
sentences.cn: 受害者被一阵弹雨击中。

sentences.en: The victim was outside a shop when he was attacked.
sentences.cn: 被害人遇袭时正在一家商店的外面。

sentences.en: They hurled abuse at their victim as they doused him with petrol.
sentences.cn: 他们一边大声辱骂这名受害者一边将汽油淋在他身上。

sentences.en: We usually think of a victim of mugging as being someone elderly.
sentences.cn: 我们通常以为被拦路抢劫的受害者是老年人。

trans.tran_cn: 受害者，遇难者，祭品，牺牲品
trans.tran_en: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered
